    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static RequestPayment.Request newInstance(java.lang.String patternId,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Creates instance of payment's request for general purposes. In other words for payments to a specific pattern_id with known parameters. Consider to use implementations of PaymentParams especially for p2p and phone-topup payments.
        Parameters:
        patternId - pattern_id (p2p, phone-topup or shop).
        params - payment parameters.
        Returns:
        new request instance.

      • newInstance

        public static RequestPayment.Request newInstance(PaymentParams paymentParams)
        Creates instance of payment's request by providing convenience wrapper.
        Parameters:
        paymentParams - payment parameters wrapper.
        Returns:
        new request instance.

      • requestUrlBase

        protected java.lang.String requestUrlBase(HostsProvider hostsProvider)
        Description copied from class: BaseApiRequest
        Creates base URL of a request. For instance base URL for https://money.yandex.ru/api/method?param=value is https://money.yandex.ru/api/method.
        Specified by:
        requestUrlBase in class BaseApiRequest<RequestPayment>
        Parameters:
        hostsProvider - hosts provider
        Returns:
        base URL of a request
